item.title: ReadLogger
item.description: Reading log screen. User can edit a specific log. User can remove a specific log. Create new reading screen. User can create a new reading and it will be added to the database. After submitting the new reading, user will be taken back to the reading log screen. Create new user screen. User can create a new user and it will update the user database. After submitting new user, the new username will appear in the dropdown list when adding a new reading.

item.title: About Me
item.description: How are you? I am a software developer with a strong understanding in building web applications. I'm looking to make an impact in an junior level engineering role. I prefer to use the technologies listed below, but I am open to new opportunities. I am constantly learning and working on projects. Please feel free to visit my github or projects page to see what I am working on! Technologies I use Javascript Node.

item.title: Contact Information
item.description: Thank you for visiting my site. Please feel free to communicate with me through the following methods: Email: davalos.alexh@gmail.com Phone: 571-213-1707 Github: alex-davalos

item.title: Todo List
item.description: View Source Application that allows users to add tasks to a todo list. User is able to add and remove tasks in the list. Added hovering feature to make it more clear to user which task their cursor is on. Applied techniques learned from FreeCodeCamp's Learn React JS series - React fundamentals, React state, JSX, and css styling. This project helped me gain a better understanding of React.js fundamentals. Skills Acquired: React.

item.title: Recipe Search App
item.description: View Source Application that allows user to look up recipes based off of a key ingredient. The application is written in React and the recipe search API from edamam.com. There are more than one million search results for this API! Skills Acquired: React API Javascript Async, Await UseEffect method More projects will be added soon!

item.title: Javascript Task List
item.description: Demo View Source Project from Traversy Media's Javascript Udemy course. Task list application that allows adding, removing, and filtering tasks. Tasks are stored in local storage. Page is styled with Materialize CSS. Skills Acquired: Javascript HTML5 Materialize DOM Manipulation Local Storage More projects will be added soon!

item.title: Google Calculator
item.description: Demo View Source Application modeled after the Google calculator. Applied techniques learned from JavaScript Crash Course - vanilla js, structuring app, and dom manipulation. This project helped me gain a better understanding of JavaScript fundamentals. Skills Acquired: Javascript HTML5 CSS3 ES6 More projects will be added soon!

item.title: Netflix Page
item.description: Demo View Source Replicated a version of Netflix's webpage based off of project from Traversy Media's Udemy course. Projects goal was to master the use of CSS including the concepts of Flexbox and Grid. Javascript was used to allow for content to be displayed on different tabs of the webpage. Page was designed to be responsive in case user viewed on a smaller screen such as a mobile device. Used the icon toolkit “Font Awesome” for icons.
